Class LockManager

public class LockManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides lock management functions.

Constructor Summary
LockManager()
          This constructor creates a database locker and a Hashtable to hold records' locker.

Method Detail

getLocker

public void getLocker(int recordNumber)
               throws java.lang.Exception
Get the locker related to the record number. If record number is -1 then get the database locker.
Parameters:
int - recordNumber The record to be locked.
Throws:
IOException - Thrown if cannot lock the record.

releaseLocker

public void releaseLocker(int recordNumber)
Rlease the locker related to the record number.
Parameters:
int - recordNumber The record to be unlocked.
